summary.span: 表示 XML 元素或属性的名称。

span.span: Represents a name of an XML element or attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 名称包括命名空间和本地名称。XML names include a namespace and a local name. 一个*完全限定的名称*是命名空间和本地名称的组合。A *fully qualified name* is the combination of the namespace and local name. ## 创建一个 XName 对象Creating an XName Object 不包含任何公共构造函数。 does not contain any public constructors. 相反，此类提供了隐式转换，允许您创建。Instead, this class provides an implicit conversion from that allows you to create an . 使用此转换的最常见位置是构造的元素或属性时： 的第一个参数构造函数是。The most common place you use this conversion is when constructing an element or attribute: The first argument to the constructor is an . 通过传递的字符串，您可以充分利用隐式转换。By passing a string, you take advantage of the implicit conversion. 以下代码使用不在命名空间的名称创建一个元素：The following code creates an element with a name that is in no namespace: ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("ElementName", "content"); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` 在 Visual Basic 中是更适合使用 XML 文本：In Visual Basic, it is more appropriate to use XML literals: ```vb Dim root As XElement = content Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml content ``` 分配到一个字符串通过隐式转换从。Assigning a string to an uses the implicit conversion from . Visual Basic 示例创建使用 XML 文本。The Visual Basic example creates the using XML literals. 即使使用 XML 文本时，对象创建为。Even though XML literals are used, an object is created for the . 此外，可以调用方法对象。In addition, you can call the method for an object. 但是，建议的方法是使用从字符串的隐式转换。However, the recommended way is to use the implicit conversion from string. ## 在 Namespace 中创建一个 XNameCreating an XName in a Namespace 与 XML 一样可以位于一个命名空间，也可以是任何命名空间中。As with XML, an can be in a namespace, or it can be in no namespace. 对于 C#，用于创建建议的方法命名空间中是声明对象，然后使用加法运算符的替代。For C#, the recommended approach for creating an in a namespace is to declare the object, then use the override of the addition operator. 对于 Visual Basic 中，建议的方法是使用 XML 文本和全局命名空间声明创建的命名空间中的 XML。For Visual Basic, the recommended approach is to use XML literals and global namespace declarations to create XML that is in a namespace. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "ElementName", "content"); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim root As XElement = content Console.WriteLine(root) End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml content ``` ## 在没有 Namespace 中创建一个 XNameCreating an XName in no Namespace 属性的保证对象不能为 null。The property of an object is guaranteed to not be null. 如果不在命名空间，则属性将设置为。If the is in no namespace, then the property will be set to . 下面的代码演示此：The following code demonstrates this: ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("ElementName", "content"); if (root.Name.Namespace == XNamespace.None) Console.WriteLine("The element is in no namespace."); else Console.WriteLine("The element is in a namespace."); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = content If (root.Name.Namespace Is XNamespace.None) Then Console.WriteLine("The element is in no namespace.") Else Console.WriteLine("The element is in a namespace.") End If ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` The element is in no namespace. ``` ## 使用扩展的名称Using Expanded Names 此外可以创建展开的 XML 名称的形式从`{namespace}localname`:You can also create an from a expanded XML name in the form `{namespace}localname`: ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("{http://www.adventure-works.com}ElementName", "content"); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = New XElement("{http://www.adventure-works.com}ElementName", "content") Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml content ``` 请注意，创建通过扩展名称是效率低于创建对象和使用的加法运算符重写。Be aware that creating an through an expanded name is less efficient than creating an object and using the override of the addition operator. 它还是比导入全局命名空间和 Visual Basic 中使用 XML 文本效率较低。It is also less efficient than importing a global namespace and using XML literals in Visual Basic. 如果您创建使用扩展名，LINQ to XML 必须找到一个命名空间的原子化的实例。If you create an using an expanded name, LINQ to XML must find the atomized instance of a namespace. 每次使用扩展名称都必须重复此工作。This work must be repeated for every use of an expanded name. 这一附加时间很可能是可以忽略不计，编写 LINQ 查询; 时但是，它可能会很明显时创建的大型 XML 树。This additional time is likely to be negligible when writing LINQ queries; however, it might be significant when creating a large XML tree. ## 原子化 XName 对象XName Objects are Atomized 对象一定不会是原子化;也就是说，如果两个对象具有完全相同的命名空间和完全相同的本地名称，则它们将共享同一个实例。 objects are guaranteed to be atomized; that is, if two objects have exactly the same namespace and exactly the same local name, they will share the same instance. 相等和比较运算符还显式提供实现此目的。The equality and comparison operators are also provided explicitly for this purpose. 还具有其他优点，此功能可以更快地执行的查询。Among other benefits, this feature allows for faster execution of queries. 时筛选后的元素或属性的名称，表示在谓词中比较使用标识比较，而非值比较。When filtering on the name of elements or attributes, the comparisons expressed in predicates use identity comparison, not value comparison. 它是确定这两个引用实际上引用同一个对象来比较两个字符串比要快得多。It is much faster to determine that two references actually refer to the same object than to compare two strings.

span.span: LINQ to XML

span.span: LINQ to XML
Gets an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法提供重载，允许您创建从展开的 XML 名称。This method provides overloads that allow you to create an from a expanded XML name. 您可以创建窗体中的字符串`{namespace}localname`，或从一个命名空间和单独指定的本地名称。You can create an from a string in the form `{namespace}localname`, or from a namespace and a local name, specified separately. 更常见的、 更轻松的方式来创建是使用从字符串的隐式转换。A much more common and easier way to create an is to use the implicit conversion from string. 若要创建的命名空间中的名称，常用方法是使用加法运算符重载，可用于合并对象和一个字符串。To create a name that is in a namespace, the common approach is to use the addition operator overload that allows you to combine an object and a string. 有关详细信息和示例，请参阅[如何： 创建包含命名空间 (C#) (LINQ to XML) 的文档](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/af4a595e-ffb2-4187-a61b-d5ed71642c4c)。For more information and examples, see [How to: Create a Document with Namespaces (C#) (LINQ to XML)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/af4a595e-ffb2-4187-a61b-d5ed71642c4c). 在 Visual Basic 中使用命名空间的详细信息，请参阅[在 Visual Basic (LINQ to XML) 中的命名空间](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/10b7ba7b-518c-4f14-899f-892575d14dcc)。For more information on using namespaces in Visual Basic, see [Namespaces in Visual Basic (LINQ to XML)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/10b7ba7b-518c-4f14-899f-892575d14dcc). 因为对象原子化，因此如果已有完全相同的名称，则分配的变量将指向现有。Because objects are atomized, if there is an existing with exactly the same name, the assigned variable will refer to the existing . 如果已有现有，一个新的其中一个将创建并初始化。If there is no existing , a new one will be created and initialized.

span.span: LINQ to XML

summary.span: 从展开名称获取 对象。

span.span: Gets an object from an expanded name.

returns.span: 从展开名称构造的 对象。

span.span: An object constructed from the expanded name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法包含重载，允许您创建。This method contains overloads that allow you to create an . 你可以从展开的 XML 名称的形式创建它`{namespace}localname`，或从一个命名空间和单独指定的本地名称。You can create it from a expanded XML name in the form `{namespace}localname`, or from a namespace and a local name, specified separately. 更常见的、 更轻松的方式来创建是使用从字符串的隐式转换。A much more common and easier way to create an is to use the implicit conversion from string. 因为原子化，因此如果已存在完全相同的名称，则分配的变量将指向现有。Because are atomized, if there is an existing with exactly the same name, the assigned variable will refer to the existing . 如果已有现有，一个新的其中一个将创建并初始化。If there is no existing , a new one will be created and initialized. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了使用此方法。The following example shows the use of this method. ```csharp XName name = XName.Get("{http://www.adventure-works.com}Root"); XElement el = new XElement(name, "content"); Console.WriteLine(el); // This is the preferred approach for specifying the XName in the // constructor of XElement. XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement el2 = new XElement(aw + "Root", "content"); Console.WriteLine(el2); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim name As XName = XName.Get("{http://www.adventure-works.com}Root") Dim el As XElement = New XElement(name, "content") Console.WriteLine(el) ' The preferred approach for specifying an XName in a namespace ' for Visual Basic is to import a global namespace. Dim el2 As XElement = content Console.WriteLine(el2) End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` content content ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法包含重载，允许您创建。This method contains overloads that allow you to create an . 创建从窗体的展开 XML 名称`{namespace}localname`，或从一个命名空间和单独指定的本地名称。You can create it from an expanded XML name in the form `{namespace}localname`, or from a namespace and a local name, specified separately. 更常见的、 更轻松的方式来创建是使用从字符串的隐式转换。A much more common and easier way to create an is to use the implicit conversion from string. 因为原子化，因此如果已存在完全相同的名称，则分配的变量将指向现有。Because are atomized, if there is an existing with exactly the same name, the assigned variable will refer to the existing . 如果已有现有，一个新的其中一个将创建并初始化。If there is no existing , a new one will be created and initialized. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了使用此方法。The following example shows the use of this method. ```csharp XName name = XName.Get("Root", "http://www.adventure-works.com"); XElement el = new XElement(name, "content"); Console.WriteLine(el); // This is the preferred form. XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement el2 = new XElement(aw + "Root", "content"); Console.WriteLine(el2); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim name As XName = XName.Get("{http://www.adventure-works.com}Root") Dim el As XElement = New XElement(name, "content") Console.WriteLine(el) ' The preferred approach for specifying an XName in a namespace ' for Visual Basic is to import a global namespace. Dim el2 As XElement = content Console.WriteLine(el2) End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` content content ```

summary.span: 获取名称的本地（非限定）部分。

span.span: A that contains the local (unqualified) part of the name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性保证不是`null`。This property is guaranteed to not be `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了使用此属性。The following example shows the use of this property. ```csharp XNamespace ns = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(ns + "Root", "content"); Console.WriteLine(root.Name); Console.WriteLine(root.Name.LocalName); Console.WriteLine(root.Name.Namespace); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim root As XElement = Console.WriteLine(root.Name) Console.WriteLine(root.Name.LocalName) Console.WriteLine(root.Name.Namespace) End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` {http://www.adventure-works.com}Root Root http://www.adventure-works.com ```

span.span: An that contains the namespace part of the name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性一定不会是 `null`。The property is guaranteed to not be `null`. 如果没有命名空间中为此属性返回。If an is in no namespace, this property returns . ## Examples 下面的示例显示了使用此属性。The following example shows the use of this property. ```csharp XNamespace ns = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(ns + "Root", "content"); Console.WriteLine(root.Name); Console.WriteLine(root.Name.LocalName); Console.WriteLine(root.Name.Namespace); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim root As XElement = Console.WriteLine(root.Name) Console.WriteLine(root.Name.LocalName) Console.WriteLine(root.Name.Namespace) End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` {http://www.adventure-works.com}Root Root http://www.adventure-works.com ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个便捷属性来获取命名空间名称从。This is a convenience property to get the namespace name from an . ## Examples 此示例中的命名空间中创建的元素，然后打印该元素的命名空间。This example creates an element in a namespace, and then prints the element's namespace. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root"); Console.WriteLine(root.Name.NamespaceName); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim root As XElement = Console.WriteLine(root.Name.NamespaceName) End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` http://www.adventure-works.com ```

Public Shared Operator == (left As XName, right As XName) As Boolean

span.span: The first to compare.
The second to compare.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示 的两个实例是否相等。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether two instances of are equal.

returns.span: 如果 和 相等，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if and are equal; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 运算符重载`==`并`!=`都包括在内，以启用之间的比较和一个`string`，如`element.Name == "SomeElementName"`。The operator overloads `==` and `!=` are included to enable comparisons between and a `string`, such as`element.Name == "SomeElementName"`. 在 C# 中的预定义的引用相等运算符需要有一个操作数可以转换为其他仅通过引用转换的类型。The predefined reference equality operators in C# require one operand to be convertible to the type of the other through reference conversions only. 这些运算符不考虑从到字符串的隐式转换。These operators do not consider the implicit conversion from string to . ## Examples 下面的示例演示一些比较对象和字符串。The following example shows some comparisons between objects and strings. ```csharp XName xn; xn = XName.Get("Root"); Console.WriteLine(xn == "Root"); xn = XName.Get("Root", "http://www.adventure-works.com"); Console.WriteLine(xn == "{http://www.adventure-works.com}Root"); XElement root = new XElement("Root", "content"); Console.WriteLine(root.Name == "Root"); ``` ```vb Dim xn As XName xn = XName.Get("Root") Console.WriteLine(xn = "Root") xn = XName.Get("Root", "http://www.adventure-works.com") Console.WriteLine(xn = "{http://www.adventure-works.com}Root") Dim root As XElement = New XElement("Root", "content") Console.WriteLine(root.Name = "Root") ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` True True True ```

span.span: LINQ to XML

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建时，会使用此隐式运算符或通过将字符串传递给适当的构造函数。You are using this implicit operator when you create an or by passing a string to the appropriate constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例创建通过将字符串分配给它，这样就可调用此隐式转换运算符。The following example creates an by assigning a string to it, which invokes this implicit conversion operator. ```csharp XElement el = new XElement("{http://www.adventure-works.com}Root", "content"); Console.WriteLine(el); // The preferred approach is to initialize an XNamespace object // and use the overload of the addition operator. XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", "content"); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim el As XElement = New XElement("{http://www.adventure-works.com}Root", "content") Console.WriteLine(el) ' The preferred approach is to import a global namespace and ' use an XML literal. Dim root As XElement = content Console.WriteLine(root) End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` content content ```

returns.span: 如果 和 不相等，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if and are not equal; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 运算符重载`==`并`!=`都包括在内，以启用之间的比较和一个字符串，如`element.Name == "SomeElementName"`。The operator overloads `==` and `!=` are included to enable comparisons between and a string, such as`element.Name == "SomeElementName"`. 在 C# 中的预定义的引用相等运算符需要有一个操作数可以转换为其他仅通过引用转换的类型。The predefined reference equality operators in C# require one operand to be convertible to the type of the other through reference conversions only. 这些运算符不考虑从到字符串的隐式转换。These operators do not consider the implicit conversion from string to . ## Examples 下面的 C# 示例比较为一个字符串，调用了此运算符的对象。The following C# example compares an object to a string, which invokes this operator. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", "content"); Console.WriteLine(root.Name != "{http://www.adventure-works.com}Root"); // the following is the preferred idiom Console.WriteLine(root.Name != aw + "Root"); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim root As XElement = content Console.WriteLine(root.Name <> "{http://www.adventure-works.com}Root") ' the following is the preferred idiom Console.WriteLine(root.Name <> GetXmlNamespace() + "Root") End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` False False ```

span.span: LINQ to XML

summary.span: 以 {namespace}localname 格式返回展开的 XML 名称。

span.span: Returns the expanded XML name in the format {namespace}localname.

returns.span: 一个 其中包含格式为 {namespace}localname 的展开的 XML 名称。

span.span: A that contains the expanded XML name in the format {namespace}localname.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例调用，并传递。The following example calls , passing an . 这将导致要在调用方法。This causes the method to be called. ```csharp XNamespace ns = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(ns + "Root", "content"); Console.WriteLine(root.Name); Console.WriteLine(root.Name.LocalName); Console.WriteLine(root.Name.Namespace); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim root As XElement = content Console.WriteLine(root.Name) Console.WriteLine(root.Name.LocalName) Console.WriteLine(root.Name.Namespace) End Sub End Module ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` {http://www.adventure-works.com}Root Root http://www.adventure-works.com ```
